constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 102 (Wednesday, June 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MURPHY of Florida:
H.R. 8083.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 authorizing Congress to
provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States.
Article I, Section 8, Clause 12 authorizing Congress to
raise and support armies.
[Page H5611]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia, the Pacific, Central Asia and Nonproliferation.

title: Assessing Chinese Special Operations Forces Act of 2022
